scenes.name: Hospital

scenes.name: Fenway
scenes.description: Cray and buddy make way down corridor.  Electrical guy does his thing. Cameras go down.  “Who called 911?”  Confrontation with security  They address cash room.  “No one’s going to prison”  They carry money to garage area. All quiet. Too quiet.  Meet up with EMTs  Cray feels uneasy. Looks outside and sees street swarming with cops.

scenes.name: Outside Fenway
scenes.description: FBI arm themselves.  “Sir, no response from cash room”

scenes.name: Garage
scenes.description: Gun shots. It’s on.  They sneak out as cops.

scenes.name: Fenway exterior
scenes.description: FBI spots Crays buddy. Firefight. He shot in head.  Cray takes coo car.
